alert.note: Alert for Grande Ronde Valley (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 30 at 6:26AM PST until December 30 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...South winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Grande Ronde Valley. * WHEN...Until 10 AM PST this morning. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strongest winds are expected through Ladd and Pyles canyons and the southern Grande Ronde Valley.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
